channel.title: InsidiaX SoulSplit CombatAssistant CRASH [FIXED BY ME]
channel.description:
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rzyixw.png[/img]
I FIXED IT... here's how:
Open CombatAssistant and search for "c.SSPLIT = true;" and add this under it
Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264);
this will eliminate the error popping up in the server cmd and still have the gfx of soulsplit
also remember to search for "c.SSPLIT = false;" and delete this: Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738
save and compile and your done

item.title: InsidiaX SoulSplit CombatAssistant CRASH [FIXED BY ME]
item.dc:creator: @RSVITA RSVITA
item.description:
@RSVITA wrote:

I FIXED IT… here’s how:

Open CombatAssistant and search for “c.SSPLIT = true;”
and add this under it

Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264);

this will eliminate the error popping up in the server cmd and still have the gfx of soulsplit

also remember to search for “c.SSPLIT = false;” and delete this:
Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738

save and compile and your done
